channel.title: Pluribus on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Pluribus on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Bob Odenkirk Talks Potential ‘Nobody’ Quadrilogy, ‘Pluribus’ Hype and Not Missing Saul Goodman
item.description: After 14 years in the ‘Breaking Bad’ world, Odenkirk hasn’t looked back, but says he’d be up for one (or two) more ‘Nobody’ films.

item.title: Bob Odenkirk Talks Potential ‘Nobody’ Quadrilogy, ‘Pluribus’ Hype and Not Missing Saul Goodman
item.description: After 14 years in the ‘Breaking Bad’ world, Odenkirk hasn’t looked back, but says he’d be up for one (or two) more ‘Nobody’ films.

item.title: Vince Gilligan and Rhea Seehorn’s Apple Series Has a Title and a Premiere Date
item.description: And an unsettling teaser video too, with ‘Pluribus’ set for release in November.
